Whether this edge should use automatic routing to avoid obstacles.

Type

The visual type of the edge (bezier, straight, step, etc.).

public EdgeType Type { get; set; }

Property Value

EdgeType

Waypoints

Optional waypoints for custom edge routing. When set, the edge will pass through these intermediate points. Does not include the start and end points (port positions).

public List<Point>? Waypoints { get; set; }

Property Value

List<Point>
